column1: Little Goat Diner////Machos nachos ($14) were described as a life changing experience by a friend. Yes
column2: these nachos came in an enormous portion
column6: crunchy house-made chips. But these nachos were also a bit too much. I could've done without the heaps of cheese and sour cream
column7: and the BBQ sauce from the made the chips soggy very fast. On the other hand
column8: the pickled onions and peppers were amazing with the pulled pork. I'd call them the best nachos I've had
column9: but that bar is set pretty low
column10: and I think this is a case where less is more!
